items.title: Enhance Kling Documentation in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: This update significantly enhances the Kling documentation by adding detailed conditions and consumption data in the API JSON files. Additionally, the development guide now includes the new 'kling-video-o1' model, providing clearer instructions for users. These changes aim to improve user understanding and facilitate better integration of the Kling video generation features.

items.title: Kubernetes Deployment Scripts Updated in Platform Service ðŸš€
items.summary: This update enhances the Kubernetes deployment scripts across multiple services, including nanobanana, veo, and sora, by adding service application commands. Additionally, several outdated test files have been removed to streamline the deployment process. These changes aim to improve deployment efficiency and maintainability.
